attributes.action: Give the people of the UK the absolute right to fly the union flag from any building , without fear of council interference or accusations of racism
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Make it law that all public buildings display the union flag at all times, as in other countries. Turkey for instance are proud of thier flag and fly it from every public building school post office police station etc.
Be proud of our heritage on our 300th anniversary.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Give the people of the UK the absolute right to fly the union flag from any building, without fear of council interference or accusations of racism."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number-10.gov.uk/output/Page11736.asp
